abstract: The nation’s retailers said they suffered a fourth consecutive month of steep sales declines in January, underscoring a broad and sustained shutdown in consumer spending.
snippet: The nation’s retailers said they suffered a fourth consecutive month of steep sales declines in January, underscoring a broad and sustained shutdown in consumer spending.
lead_paragraph: The nation’s retailers said they suffered a fourth consecutive month of steep sales declines in January, underscoring a broad and sustained shutdown in consumer spending.

headline.main: Sales Fall Sharply for Retailers Not Named Wal-Mart
headline.print_headline: Sales Fall Sharply for Retailers Not Named Wal-Mart
